bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with a white membrane enclosing the tongue, in some cases the entire back of the tongue, as major sign. It was believed that this membrane must be removed lest the patient will be mute. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fan shi 礬石 quotes Zhi bao fang 至寶方 : 小 兒舌膜：初生小兒有白膜皮裹舌，或遍舌根 , 可以指甲刮破令血出，以燒 礬末半緑豆許傅之。若不摘去，其兒必啞 , “ Tongue membrane in children : When in a newborn child a white membrane-skin encloses the tongue, in some cases the entire tongue root, one may scratch, with the fingernail, the tongue until it bleeds. Then a mixture of roasted fan powder with about half a green bean is smeared on it. If it is not removed, the child will be mute”.
